name: TREC ITP - Rock Armouring - B1101A Te Ngarue Bridge Scour Repairs
template name: TREC ITP - Rock Armouring - B1101A Te Ngarue Bridge Scour Repairs

name: Detail - Ensure that Design is approved and Drawings are of the latest revision
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - IFC Drawings to be provided for uploading to this ITP
Detail - Set out extents and check against design drawings
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Conformance Criteria - Consistency with Construction Drawing
Detail - Once all ESC controls have been installed & the Tree Felling & Vegetation Clearance has been carried out
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - ITP for Tree Felling & Vegetation Clearance to be used
Records - TREC - Tree Felling & Vegetation Clearance ITP
Detail - Inspect fill foundation, rip rap foundation, as appropriate
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection by the Design Engineer
Conformance Criteria - Foundation must be approved, in writing, before filling commences
Detail - Material to meet specifications dependant on material type selected
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - D50 1000 rock rip rap: 100% pass 1500mm, 80% pass 1250mm, 50% pass 1000mm, 20% pass 750mm
Records - Photos to demonstrate process has been carried out
Frequency - Prior to commencement: At quarry - Confirmation of acceptability by Geotech Engineer from each source unless rock property changes are evident, in which case additional approval required
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual, geological hammer testing or scraping of rock as required by Geotechnical Engineer
Conformance Criteria - Confirmation of acceptability by Geotechnical Engineer
– Hard, durable stone with the size conforming to that shown on the drawings
– Rock shape to be as cubical as possible with limiting ratio of least dimension to greatest dimension 1:3
– Long, thin or slabby shapes are not acceptable
Records - Inspection and sign off by Geotechnical Engineer
Detail - Geotextile - Rolls delivered and delivery dockets gathered.  Compliant with Bedim A49 and Tencate PES 1000/Tencate PES 2000
Frequency - Prior to commencement of placement
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Ensure that the Engineered fill embankment is constructed to at least the finished height of the embankment protection rip rap
Frequency - Compaction testing from ~0.5m above typical WL. Sets of NDM (~5/test area) at <~1.5m vertical spacing with final test at FL. Clegg Impact Value tests at ~0.6m lifts (every 2nd layer)
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Site testing to TNZ F/1, NDMs and Cleggs (CIV) for calibration.
Conformance Criteria - Min 95% Standard Proctor density
Detail - Ensure that geotextile is placed as detailed in Specifications/Drawings with the required laps.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection

Detail - Ensure that placement of rock material is placed in such a manner to minimise segregation and avoid displacement of underlying materials.  Oversize rock to be placed such to minimise voids. Design Engineer given notice to visually inspect initial placement of riprap material
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Detail - Ensure rock slopes comply with design prior to next process taking place
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measurement
Detail - Ensure all NCRs are closed and included within QA file, Delivery Dockets and Lab Testing Spreadsheet and Test Reports to be included in QA File
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into CONQA/Procore
Records - Delivery Dockets, Test Reports, Lab Testing Register
Detail - Red pen mark up drawings to be included in QA file
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Drawings
